paragraphs: I am a Backend Developer and Database Engineer, specializing in designing and building scalable systems. With extensive knowledge of AWS and infrastructure, I craft solutions that are reliable, efficient, and secure.

I enjoy solving complex challenges by designing robust systems and creating tools or scripts that simplify workflows. My passion for open-source projects allows me to contribute to the tech community while constantly improving my craft. My goal is to ensure your systems are not only functional but also optimized for performance, empowering your business to grow with confidence.

services.title: System Design
services.description: Crafting scalable, efficient, and reliable systems to solve complex challenges with elegance.

services.title: Backend development
services.description: Developing robust and high-performing backend solutions to drive seamless functionality.

services.title: DevOps
services.description: Expertise in CI/CD pipelines, cloud infrastructure, containerization, and automated deployments.

services.title: Database Administrator
services.description: Designing and optimizing databases for scalability, reliability, and efficient data management.

highlights.title: Multi-Tenant Architecture Specialist
highlights.description: Transformed the project from a single-tenant to a multi-tenant system,enabling the same codebase and hardware to support multiple customers with minimal resource overhead.

highlights.title: Tool Developer
highlights.description: Wrote EsXport, a tool that enabled the export of complex data from an Elasticsearch cluster by transforming SQL to NoSQL, significantly speeding up export requirements and bypassing traditional database methods.

highlights.title: Logging Pipeline Setup with ELK Stack
highlights.description: Set up a logging pipeline by configuring the ELK stack to ingest 600GB of server logs per day from production servers. Pushed logs into Elasticsearch for efficient visualization and real-time search capabilities in Kibana.

highlights.title: API Development
highlights.description: Developed and wrote 50+ APIs to power core platform functionalities, managing over 100 million parcels and 4 billion events through optimized search and SQL-based transformation scripts for seamless data flow.

highlights.title: System Designer
highlights.description: Designed the database schema and architecture for efficient data storage, including table designs, ensuring high-performance event tracking and real-time search across millions of parcels.

highlights.title: ETL Engineer
highlights.description: Built ETL pipelines to transform raw tracking data from external carriers into manageable formats, enabling seamless integration and data storage for efficient parcel tracking, processing around 5 billion records to make the data manageable for the platform.

highlights.title: Cloud Infrastructure Engineer
highlights.description: Managed the complete cloud infrastructure, overseeing server uptime, downtimes, deployments, and ensuring smooth and reliable operations, while also reducing costs by 20%.

highlights.title: Tool Developer
highlights.description: Wrote Esyncer, a tool to synchronize data from SQL (Postgres) to NoSQL (Elasticsearch), enabling faster search capabilities.

highlights.title: Performance Engineer
highlights.description: Optimized search capabilities to enable lightning-fast querying and tracking of 100 million parcels and 4 billion events in milliseconds. Integrated Elasticsearch to enable lightning-fast searches within milliseconds.

highlights.title: DevOps Engineer
highlights.description: Implemented Dockerization for the entire setup, ensuring consistency, scalability, and ease of deployment in both development and production environments.

highlights.title: Backend Developer
highlights.description: Developed and wrote 10+ APIs to power core platform functionalities and improve system performance, while managing over 10 million parcels and 100 million events through SQL-based transformation scripts for seamless data flow.

highlights.title: System Designer
highlights.description: Designed the database schema and architecture using technologies like Redis and Redshift to ensure scalable and efficient data storage.

education.description: Completed Bachelor's in Computer Science with an 8.5 CGPA, graduating on a full scholarship for academic excellence.
Achieved top rank in school academics, awarded a scholarship for outstanding performance, and consistently excelled in math and science.
